ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Research....not always necessary..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Mesmerization a research spell? I have it now, bought it in Ak Anon, very useful spell btw, not many people really understand it. It does two things, stuns
ygData.messageBody:
>
> > From: "Proteus Proteus" <proteus456@...>
> >
> > Many of our "research" spells can be found by
> carefully looking at
> > other vendors. Eg: Disempower, Levitate, and (I
> believe) beserker
> > strength can be found at the Shaman Vendors. There
> are some others
> > that are found at Cleric vendors (soothe/calm) for
> one. Basically,
> > look at the spell lists, and cross-reference. Some
> spells are only
> > found at specific vendors in certain cities
> (erudin has
> > illusion:halfling, neriak has the metal
> enchantment, Freeport has
> > Brilliance (a lvl 44 spell BTW), etc...etc..). I
> believe
> > mesmerization is a research only spell, and have
> yet to find
> > Pillage....
> > Proteus

Mesmerization a research spell? I have it now, bought it in Ak'Anon,
very useful spell btw, not many people really understand it.

It does two things, stuns a mob for about 30 seconds or until it takes
DAMAGE, very important there as you can still debuff the mob without
taking off the stun effect. Secondly, and most importantly, it ERASES a
mobs hate list at the moment its cast. Think about it.
I use it for soloing yellows all the time.
